content: you always have to skip one single_crochet of the actual row round 4 ch1 single_crochet in base of ch1 single_crochet in each st join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet 52sc round 11 ch1 single_crochet in base of ch1 single_crochet in next 2sts fp double_crochet around round 5 ch1 single_crochet in base of ch1 fp double_crochet around first fp double_crochet two each of first 2 fp double_crochet two row below *single_crochet in next 4sts fp double_crochet row below single_crochet in next 4sts *fp double_crochet around each of next 2 fp around each of next 2 fp double_crochet two row below* repeat from * 2 double_crochet two row below single_crochet in next 4sts* repeat from * 2 times times more single_crochet in next 6sts fp double_crochet around each of next 2 fp double_crochet more fp double_crochet around last fp double_crochet two row below single_crochet in next two row below repeat from * 3 times more single_crochet in next 3sts 2sts fp double_crochet around first fp double_crochet two row below single_crochet in next 4sts join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet 52sts repeat from * 3 times more fp double_crochet around last fp double_crochet two row below single_crochet in next st join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet 52sts www monpetitviolon etsy com 2 foundation ring ch3 join with slip_stitch into first chain round 1 ch1 7sc into the ring join with slip_stitch into first single_crochet round 2 ch2 puff st in base of ch2 puff st in each next 6sts join with slip_stitch in top chain of chain-2 last round ch1 *single_crochet in next st skip next st* repeat from * until one st remain fasten_off but leave long tail thread with it the tapestry needle and sew the button on the front of the cover take care that you when you sew you work through both layers round 12 ch1 single_crochet in base of ch1 single_crochet in each st join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet 52sc rnds 13-16 repeat rnds 11 and 12 twice repeat row 5 16 two times more but in the very last round work the loop for button in following way last round ch1 single_crochet in base of ch1 single_crochet in next 12sts ch15 single_crochet in next 39sts join with slip_stitch in ch1 fasten_off www monpetitviolon etsy com 3
